The following gladiator poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: Would you be interested in playing a 
gladiator tournament? 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- No, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- yes, but use only built-in scenarios, 1 votes, 11.11%  
- yes, but create a new set of scenarios just for the tournament, 2 votes, 22.22%  
- yes, use a combination of existing scenarios and add new ones if necessary, 6 votes, 66.67%  



For more information about this group, please visit 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator
